title: The Vampire's Assistant
description: My Name is Darren Shan. I'm a half-vampire.I wasn't born that way. I used to be ordinary.My days as a human were over. My nights as a vampire's assistant had begun.Darren joins the powerful vampire Mr. Crepsley as his assistant, and they return to the mysterious freak show. There, Darren makes friends with the snake-boy, Evra Von. As he struggles with his new life as a vampire's assistant, Darren tries desperately to resist the temptation that sickens him...the one thing that can keep him alive.But destiny is calling...The wolf-man is waiting.
author: Darren Shan
